DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test effectiveness smartphone application smoke cessation smoker age 18 65 year .
DOC.detailed_description: In randomize control trial , subject randomly assign receive one two treatment : ( 1 ) standard smartphone application support smoker work become quit-free , ( 2 ) test intervention , app train behavioral strategy smoke cessation . The primary endpoint interest 1-week point prevalence abstinence end treatment , 3 6 month follow-up individual .
DOC.criteria: Smoke 5+ cigarettes/day < 3 month abstinence past year Have smartphone Score great equal 8 10 Contemplation Ladder ( Biener & Abrams , 1991 )
